enterPassword.title: You'll need a password
enterPassword.description: Make sure it's 8 characters or more.
enterPassword.passwordError: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

enterPassword.termsDescription: X may use your contact information, including your email address and phone number for purposes outlined in our Privacy Policy, like keeping your account secure and personalizing our services, including ads.
enterPassword.findableText: Others will be able to find you by email or phone number, when provided, unless you choose otherwise

errors.passwordRequirements: Please ensure your password meets all requirements.

success.accountCreatedDesc: Your account has been created successfully.

forgotPassword.findAccountDescription: Enter the email, phone number, or username associated with your account to change your password.
forgotPassword.verifyCodeDescription:
Check your email to get your confirmation code.
If you need to request a new code, go back and reselect a confirmation.
forgotPassword.resetPasswordDescription:
Make sure your new password is 8 characters or more.
Try including numbers, letters, and punctuation marks for a strong password.

You'll be logged out of all active sessions after your password is changed.
forgotPassword.twoFactorPrefix: Add an extra layer of security to your account with
forgotPassword.twoFactorSuffix: Enable it in your settings to help make sure that only you can access your account.

success.title: Password Reset Successful
success.message: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in using your new password.

forgotPassword.invalidInputDescription: Please enter a valid email, phone number, or username.
forgotPassword.codeSentDescription: We have sent a confirmation code to your email or phone. Please check it to continue.
forgotPassword.codeSendErrorDescription: We were unable to send the code. Please try again later.
forgotPassword.codeVerifiedDescription: Your code has been verified successfully.
forgotPassword.codeInvalidDescription: The code you entered is invalid or has expired. Please try again.
forgotPassword.weakPasswordDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
forgotPassword.passwordMismatchDescription: Please make sure the new password and confirmation match.
forgotPassword.invalidPasswordDescription: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
forgotPassword.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again.

your_account.title: Your account
your_account.description: See information about your account, download an archive of your data, or learn about your account deactivation options.

privacy_safety.description: Manage what information you see and share on X.

accessibility.title: Accessibility, display and languages
accessibility.description: Manage how X content is displayed to you.
accessibility.languages_description: Manage which languages are used to personalize your X experience.

account_info.country_helper: Select the country you live in.
account_info.logout_message: Logging out will remove all yapper data from this device

password.title: Change your password
password.description: Change your password at any time.

verify_password.description: Re-enter your X password to continue.

verify_password.failed_message: Failed to verify password. Please try again.

email.title: Change email
email.description: Your current email is {{email}}. What would you like to update it to? Your email is not displayed in your public profile on X.
email.warning: If you change your email address, any existing Google SSO connections will be removed. Review Connected accounts
email.label: Email address
email.invalid_error: Please enter a valid email address
email.updated: otp has been sent to the new email address

email.update_failed_message: Failed to update email. Please try again.

country.update_failed_message: Failed to update country. Please try again later.

username.title: Change username
username.error_same: New username must be different from current username

deactivate.title: Delete your account
deactivate.description: Find out how you can permanently delete your account.
deactivate.warning_title: This will permanently delete your account
deactivate.warning_message: You're about to start the process of deleting your Y account. Your display name, @username, and public profile will no longer be viewable on Y.com, Y for iOS, or Y for Android.
deactivate.else_message_1: If you just want to change your @username, you don't need to delete your account â€” edit it in your
deactivate.else_message_2: To use your current @username or email address with a different Y account,

confirm_deactivate.title: Confirm your password
confirm_deactivate.description: Complete your deactivation request by entering the password associated with your account.
confirm_deactivate.password_required_message: Please enter your password to continue
confirm_deactivate.incorrect_password_message: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
confirm_deactivate.deactivated_message: Your account has been deactivated successfully
confirm_deactivate.failed_message: Failed to deactivate account. Please try again.

languages.title: Select language
languages.description: Choose the language(s) you want to use to personalize your X experience.
languages.updated_message: Your language preference has been saved
languages.update_failed_message: Failed to update language. Please try again.

mute_block.description: Manage the accounts, words and notifications that you've muted or blocked.
mute_block.blocked_accounts_description: They will be able to see your public posts, but will no longer be able to engage with them. They will also not be able to follow or message you, and you will not see notifications from them.
mute_block.muted_accounts_description: Posts from muted accounts won't show up in your Home timeline. Mute accounts directly from their profile or posts.

theme.title: Dark Mode
theme.device_settings_description: Set Dark mode to use the Light or Dark selection located in your device Display & Brightness settings.

replyRestriction.title: Who can reply?
replyRestriction.subtitle: Pick who can reply to this post. Keep in mind that anyone mentioned can always reply.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete post
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
